alert.note: Alert for Tulare (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:13AM PDT until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following counties, Fresno, Kings and Tulare. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Several structures are flooded and some sand bagging operations are persisting. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 911 AM PDT, Gauge reports indicated ongoing flooding across the warned area. Flooding due to a dam floodgate release will continue. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sanger, Reedley and Laton. Other flood prone locations such as Reedley Beach, Riverland RV Park, and the King`s River Golf and Country Club will continue to see flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
